scripts.clean: npm run clean:admin && npm run clean:website
scripts.build: npm run build:admin && npm run tsc:admin && npm run build:website && npm run tsc:website
scripts.watch:admin: conc -c auto -n esbuild,tsc "NODE_ENV=development npm run build:admin" "npm run tsc:admin -- -w --preserveWatchOutput"
scripts.watch:website: conc -c auto -n esbuild,tsc "NODE_ENV=development npm run build:website" "npm run tsc:website -- -w --preserveWatchOutput"
scripts.watch: conc -c auto -n admin,website "npm run watch:admin" "npm run watch:website"
scripts.tsc: npm run tsc:admin && npm run tsc:website
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run tsc
